title: (x) Well-known realist sans-serif typeface [FF Din]
content:
I am pretty sure that I have already seen (and identified) the typeface in question countless times, but right now I seemingly cannot recall the name of the main typeface used in the following video: [http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=6ILQrUrEWe8](http://web.archive.org/web/20100909055036/http:/www.youtube.com/watch?v=6ILQrUrEWe8 "http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=6ILQrUrEWe8")

Thanks for your help!

_Edit: I **knew** that I have already seen this typeface many times before – it's DIN, of course…_
author: klickverbot

comments.content: Yes, of course, I already remembered myself. Nevertheless, thanks for the really, really fast help – you must have written your post while I was already busy moving the thread to the »Solved« section… ;)
That's what seems to happen around here ;) Glad to help.
